subject: Athletics and Sports
Relocation of Business
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The prospective owner of the Nets, Mikhail D. Prokhorov, has worldwide holdings. The N.B.A. is expected to give him its approval on Tuesday.
snippet: The prospective owner of the Nets, Mikhail D. Prokhorov, has worldwide holdings. The N.B.A. is expected to give him its approval on Tuesday.
